item.description:
Hi Meetup Members

After getting some comment("Shinnen-kai" Jan 10th) from everyone,
I wanna introduce you the Japanese(Asian) food through the cooking.
That's why I'll take place this event at this Sunday night!!
Would you like to spend a great time with us and your friends?

Where
Gathering at Malden Center Station ("T" station)
After that we move to the APT

How
<Use subway>
Take outbound orange line and get off at Malden Center Station.
I’ll wait front of the ticket gate on time(16:00).
- If you join this event, I will send you an e-mail how to go there.

<Use your car>
There are some parking areas around the Malden Center Station.
But that cost about $6, and I’m not sure whether we can use or not.
So if it possible, please come there by T train to be convenience.

What
<Food>
Appetizer - Edamame/Dashimaki-tamago/Shrimp with Lobster Sauce
Rice - Salmon roll/Onigiri (Gomoku-rice/Seaweed - You can make!!)
Soup - Asian Soup
Salad - Seafood Salad
Main - Soba(Buckwheat noodle) or Somen(Japanese vermicelli)

Schedule
16:10～18:00　Talking/Showing a movie
18:00～19:00　Dinner time
19:00～21:00　Free time

Etc
I’ll prepare some dishes for dinner. (Of course, snacks and drink)
If you like to bring something to eat or drink, you are more than welcome to do so.

I’m looking forward to enjoying with Meetup members!!
Sincerely to you.
item.name: Japanese Food Party
